REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0631 reute r f BC-PENTAIR-<PNTA>-FILES 03-11 0070

TEXT.TITLE: PENTAIR <PNTA> FILES TO OFFER PREFERRED
TEXT.BODY: Pentair Inc said it has filed for an offering of two mln shares of cumulative convertible preferred stock at an expected price of 25 dlrs per share through underwriters led by <Kidder, Peabody and Co Inc > and <Piper, Jaffray and Hopwood Inc>. It said proceeds would be used to repay bank debt incurred in the acquisition of McNeil Corp last August. Reuter
